info.name: Fix and compress Facebook home page
info.description:
Compresses your home page into a set of small avatar-squares, color-coded by type of post and fixes some issues (makes the page wider, fixes the blue top bar to screen). May not work with other Facebook mods.
Home page only, may be upgraded to work on other pages some day.
info.additionalInfo:
CC-0, do whatever you like with it.

Instruction: because of some CSS limitations (and my lack of JS-fu) the pop-up effect (posts appearing after hovering on a square) works a bit weird: to click on the pop-up, hover over the square, than move you mouse right, to the right column. Than you can click. To close the pop-up, move your mouse up or down from the square. 
(I know this explanation is a bit confusing, my English is much worse than it once was.)

I guess it's easier to figure out than to explain.

---- 

Fixed layout to look better in Firefox 4.

---- 

12 Sep 2011: Fixed to work after some Facebook changes.
